Inspired by @manton, I’ve been thinking about “where I’ve been”:

3 Countries in the World:

  • üá∫üá∏United States
  • üá®üá¶ Canada (in ~1990 we went to the Canadian side of Niagara Falls)
  • üá∫üá¶ Ukraine (work trip in 2019)

And 26 States (skipping any states I was just at an airport passing through):
